newsitem.title: ROMANIA: Romanian leu 3,245 to dollar for Sept 25 - BNR.
newsitem.headline: Romanian leu 3,245 to dollar for Sept 25 - BNR.

text.p: Romania's National Bank (BNR) announced the leu's reference rate at 3,245 to the dollar for September 25.
This reference rate was set on Monday as a weighted average based on daily reports of foreign exchange operators. It is a guidance rate used for statistical accounting purposes.
The leu's reference rate set on Friday for September 24 is 3,234 to the dollar. It was 3,227 on Monday. -- Bucharest Newsroom 40-1 3120264
